body:
@zombieadd "It's up to your interpretation." Exactly.  Once words seem like lies, it makes all things possible and is great for interpretations. From her fake tears, to all the teacher's false assumptions. I can make up some too... Maybe all she ever had was a pen... many pens, as many pens as she could fit. lol Another possible trick to get him to commit is to convince him this is her normal and give him blackmail fodder, hence the little bro comments. Was that even a lie, is little bro even real? She could be the "technically true" rapey type?

I just came from 364144 by this same author where a lie was revealed at the end. That great twist vs this open-ended. So I hope to enjoy more of their work.

@Cindarian it's not that people think it does anything. It's just so that people actually know who you're replying to since there's no reply function in this site. It makes conversations actually possible. For example, me answering your question.
Using an "@" doesn't do anything here. So why do these people think it dose?
Damn, I wish he came inside her
I mean its ironic is it not
Literally had a "hand job" shirt

Nice t-shirt she got there "Hand Job" xD. @P.A.N.D.E.M.O.N.I.U.M.: It's up to your interpretation. It could imply that she got those "impressive" grades from doing these things with other teachers OR it could also imply the fact that she was faking the whole ordeal of getting bad grades with this sensei so that she could get close to him but she is actually good at studying.
She's a cs:go knife flip professional
Cool pen spin.

This doesn't make sense. On one hand she is making it seem like she has only done lewd things with her little brother, on the other hand she is making it seem like she does lewd things with the other teachers. Which is it?
Could it be that she what?
I misread the title as "Pain Peko"
The shirt was her billboard.
This needs a loli tag.
Hey, I can pen spin as well. It's not a chick-magnet skill if you ask me
@idiotperson fckn A man keep the analysis up that was fun to read
@idiotperson get a life man why do i see ur long ass analysis under every hentai
We all need loli sex friend in our life
also i  pronounced this artist's name as "shiddin'", which is kek funny

Ehhh, I'm not sure about this one.  On the one hand I liked the art, but I am not a big fan of the male teacher type, I'm more of a female teacher kind of guy, but let us continue.  The female mentions throughout the work that she has had sex with her little brother.  An egregious act, of course, but this shows that this is not the first time she has sexually manipulated a man.   The ending also may imply that she has sex with her other teachers.  In my eyes, this harlot , or perhaps a succubus if you will, represents the desperation of certain males for sex.  A normal man would reject the girl's advancements, for obvious reasons.  But in this doujin we see this blind desperation for sex.  Many men viewing this will think "I would take up this opportunity" because they are so desperate for sex and perhaps idolize it in a way.   They have lost their standards and will accept sex in any circumstance (at least in their minds), even if a woman is forcing herself onto him.
I mean look at her shirt, the teacher had it coming
uh ohies(づ｡◕‿‿◕｡)づ
